types.html:
plavon m (plural plavons) (slang)

  1. a plan, or particularly a great one
    • 2021 July 2, 1PLIKÉ140, “Poison”‎[1]:
      C'est nous, on envoiе l'plavon, mais tu vas lâcher un billet
      We lay down a plan, but you are down for a ticket
trans: a plan, or particularly a great one

title: plavon
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pla.vɔ̃/
